drupalNodeEvent.title: Cold War 2.0? Rethinking Analogies in US-China Relations

field_description.processed: Academics and pundits alike have characterized the current state of US-China relations as a "Cold War 2.0." Is this an accurate analogy to use? Join the Long US-China Institute for a discussion with three experts on international relations and Cold War studies to rethink whether the Cold War is an appropriate model for understanding China's place in the world today. The webinar is free and open to the public.
